page.title: 02OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our class is one of four classes in a village school with 81 full-time children and 7 part-time. There are 17 children in our class aged 7-8yrs. Our class is the smallest class in the school. We enjoy english, mathematics, art and craft, games and gymnastics, swimming, music and topic work. Often we can go for walks. There are a lot of other activities we can do at dinner-time and after school: recorders, guitars, games clubs, choir and swimming. Some of our teachers are strict, they help us a lot. Our classroom is colourful, with lots of our work on the walls. We sit in small groups around square tables. We have lots of books to look at, apparatus to help us with our mathematics and also make displays to do with our topics. We like our school very much. {By Class 2. 31st May 1985.
